headline: The Walt Disney Company (DIS) Rolls Out Major Releases, Driving Subscriber Growth
summary: We recently compiled a list of the 12 Most Undervalued Dow Stocks to Buy According to Analysts. The Walt Disney Company is one of them. The Walt Disney Company (NYSE:DIS), a global entertainment leader, continues to expand its content and strategic initiatives to drive growth and engagement. In September 2025, Disney+ premiered high-profile releases, including […]

headline: Sports is the only thing keeping linear TV 'alive' right now
summary: LightShed Partners partner and media & technology analyst Rich Greenfield checks in on the state of media and streaming stocks, citing cord-cutting away from linear TV and regulatory pressures on broadcast channels. Also hear Rick Greenfield's comments on why Disney (DIS) could be better off spinning off ABC over broadcaster backlash to Jimmy Kimmel. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.

headline: How Investors Are Reacting To Walt Disney (DIS) Streaming Price Hikes and Governance Scrutiny
summary: In the past week, Walt Disney faced renewed controversy as investor groups demanded internal documents and legal action over the company's handling of Jimmy Kimmel's suspension, coinciding with the announcement of upcoming price hikes for Disney's streaming services effective October 21, 2025. This convergence of shareholder activism, political scrutiny, and business strategy is raising questions about Disney’s approach to risk management, brand reputation, and the resilience of its media...

headline: Bob Iger, Hollywood’s Statesman, Gets a Political Education
summary: Like many CEOs, the Disney boss tried to avoid President Trump’s ire even as he took heat from talent agents and stars for pulling Jimmy Kimmel’s late-night show.
